means: 赫布里底群岛（英国苏格兰西部）

sentence.Network_en: In the Hebrides they shear their sheep later than anywhere else.
sentence.Network_cn: 在赫伯里兹，剪羊毛的时间比其他任何地方都要晚。

sentence.Network_en: Scotland has about 800 islands, including the Orkney , Shetlands and Hebrides.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏格兰有800座岛屿, 包括奥克内群岛,谢特兰群岛和赫不里德群岛.

sentence.Network_en: Before independence Vanuatu was an obscure Anglo - French territory known as the New Hebrides.
sentence.Network_cn: 万那杜在独立之前一直是个不明确的英法领地,也就是常听过的新海布里地群岛.
